info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:54PM EDT until July 28 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BERKS...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND WESTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gilbertsville, or 17 miles east of Reading, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Pottstown, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Bally, Bechtelsville, Green Lane, Spring Mount, Gilbertsville, Skippack, Stowe, Boyertown, Pennsburg, Red Hill, Trumbauersville, Harleysville, Pottsgrove and Evansburg. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 34 and 41. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
